name: Sound Of My Town
description:
A downloadable game for Windows and macOS.

Sound of my Town is a cute SimCity meets music sequencer game. As the mayor,  build structures and plant forests to create a town with its own unique tune.

Controls

Mouse – Drag and drop structures onto your land. 

Each structure has a unique sound. Depending on where you place it, the pitch of the note will change.

Drag grass tiles over existing structures to remove them.

This game is part of the No Moss Studios Patreon Collections. For $2, patrons get access to 2 new games a month! Follow us on our journey here:
